Package DroneSimulation.gui

Class DroneArena

java.lang.Object
DroneSimulation.gui.DroneArena
public class DroneArena
extends java.lang.Object
A drone arena which contains objects, all of which are to be drawn on the canvas.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double arenaX  
    double arenaY  
    double randomAngle  
    double randomX  
    double randomY  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DroneArena​(double arenaX, double arenaY)
    Create an object of type DroneArena that holds the width and height of the drone arena, and the objects within.

  • Constructor Details

    • DroneArena

      public DroneArena​(double arenaX, double arenaY)
      Create an object of type DroneArena that holds the width and height of the drone arena, and the objects within.
      Parameters:
      arenaX - The width of the drone arena.
      arenaY - The height of the drone arena.

  • Method Details

    • getArenaX

      public double getArenaX()
      Returns:
      The width of the drone arena.

    • getArenaY

      public double getArenaY()
      Returns:
      The height of the drone arena.

    • addDrone

      public void addDrone()
      Add a drone into the drone arena.

    • addHunterDrone

      public void addHunterDrone()
      Add a hunter drone into the drone arena.

    • addObstacle

      public void addObstacle​(double x, double y)
      Add an obstacle into the drone arena.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of the obstacle.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the obstacle.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the drone arena of all objects.

    • checkObjects

      public void checkObjects()
      Check each object, ensuring they are not colliding into the walls of the drone arena, or other objects.

    • adjustObjects

      public void adjustObjects()
      Move each object that is present in the drone arena, excluding the obstacles.

    • drawArena

      public void drawArena​(MyCanvas mc)
      Draw each object that is present in the drone arena onto the canvas.
      Parameters:
      mc - The canvas on which the drone arena is to be drawn.

    • checkDroneAngle

      public double checkDroneAngle​(double x, double y, double radius, double angle, int objectId)
      Checks whether the drone is going to hit a wall, or if the drone is going to collide with another object and calculate the new angle accordingly.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of the drone.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the drone.
      radius - The radius of the drone.
      angle - The angle at which the drone is moving.
      objectId - The object ID of the drone.
      Returns:
      The new angle at which the drone is moving.

    • remove

      public void remove​(int id)
      Remove an object from the drone arena.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the object that is to be removed.

    • checkHit

      public int checkHit​(int id, double x, double y, double radius, java.lang.String entity)
      Check if a drone has collided with a hunter drone, or if a hunter drone has collided with an obstacle. If this is the case, remove the former from the drone arena.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the current object.
      x - The x co-ordinate of the current object.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the current object.
      radius - The radius of the current object.
      entity - The class of which the current object is an instance of.
      Returns:
      1 if an object has been removed, else 0.

    • loadArenaFromFile

      public void loadArenaFromFile​(double x, double y)
      Load the drone arena dimensions from a file.
      Parameters:
      x - The width of the drone arena.
      y - The height of the drone arena.

    • loadDroneFromFile

      public void loadDroneFromFile​(char entity, double x, double y, double radius, double angle, double speed)
      Load drones and hunter drones into the drone arena from a file.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity which is being loaded.
      x - The x co-ordinate of the drone.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the drone.
      radius - The radius of the drone.
      angle - The angle at which the drone is moving.
      speed - The speed at which the drone is moving.

    • loadObstacleFromFile

      public void loadObstacleFromFile​(double x, double y, double radius)
      Load obstacles into the drone arena from a file.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate of the obstacle.
      y - The y co-ordinate of the obstacle.
      radius - The radius of the obstacle.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String containing information of all drones in the drone arena, including the co-ordinates at which each drone is located, and in which direction they are moving.

    • saveString

      public java.lang.String saveString()
      Returns:
      String containing information about the drone arena and the objects within. Intended to be used when saving a drone arena.
